title: Salesforce to invest $15 billion in San Francisco over five years
description: (Reuters) -Cloud software provider Salesforce said on Monday it would invest $15 billion in San Francisco over the next five years to support artificial intelligence innovation and workforce development in the city.
content:
(Reuters) -Cloud software provider Salesforce said on Monday it would invest $15 billion in San Francisco over the next five years to support artificial intelligence innovation and workforce development in the city.

title: OpenAI taps Broadcom to build its first AI processor in latest chip deal
description: (Reuters) -OpenAI has partnered with Broadcom to produce its first in-house artificial intelligence processors, the latest chip tie-up for the ChatGPT maker as it races to secure the computing power needed to meet surging demand for its services.
content:

title: Radhika Gupta Slams Finfluencer's 'False' Claim On Missed Gold, Silver, AI Rallies
description: When a prominent finfluencer recently stirred debate on social media, alleging that Indian mutual funds caused retail investors to miss major rallies in gold, silver, cryptocurrencies, and artificial intelligence (AI) stocks over the past year. Radhika Gupta, Managing Director and CEO of Edelweiss Mutual Fund, dismissed the assertions as “false”.

title: How AI, ML Transform SEO Marketing
description: Artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML) are changing the ways companies handle content marketing and search engine optimization (SEO). According to a general survey, 49% of organizations use machine learning and AI in marketing and sales. AI and machine learning are becoming very important in digital marketing. title: OpenAI taps Broadcom to build its first AI processor in latest chip deal
description: OpenAI has partnered with Broadcom to produce its first in-house artificial intelligence processors. The companies said on Monday that OpenAI would design the chips, which Broadcom will develop and deploy starting in the second half of 2026.
content:

title: Health care's rush to AI scribes risks patient safety, researchers warn
description: The rapid adoption of artificial intelligence (AI) scribes in health care is outpacing validation and oversight, potentially compromising patient safety, Columbia Nursing researchers warn.
content:

title: Micron’s Newly-Converted Bull Sees 50% Gain on Memory Supercycle
description: Micron Technology Inc.’s biggest skeptic has become its biggest advocate, saying the chipmaker is in the early stages of an artificial intelligence “memory supercycle” that will drive even more gains for the stock.

title: Data, IIIT Hyderabad Announces 2nd Cohort of Workshop on IoT
description: Hyderabad (Telangana) [India], October 13: IHub-Data, IIIT Hyderabad, announces the 2nd cohort of its 3-day hands-on workshop on 'IoT-AI for Healthcare', designed to equip students with practical skills at the intersection of healthcare, Internet of Things (IoT), and Artificial Intelligence (AI).
